titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the city of London in Common-Councell assembled: to the Right Honourable the Lords & Commons in Parliament assembled. Together, with the answers of both Houses to the said petition.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes Printer to the Honorable City of London,
